title: VIKTOS Men's Taculus CCW Coolmax Regular Comfort Fit Durable Stretch Concealed Gear Carry Outdoor Hunting Gun Shooting Jeans
description: SOFT AND COMFORTABLE - Designed for a professional appearance, these VIKTOS Taculus jeans are made with a 9.5oz Stretch Coolmax denim chassis, making them more comfortable than all other men's jeans

HANDY FEATURES - The cashout coin pockets are designed to fit a 15rd gun magazine, while the front belt loops are positioned for improved appendix carry. The Apndx interior waistband webbing also allows for non-belt appendix carry options

EASY ACCESS - You can easily access your mags or EDC with two front pockets, while the Hipshoot rear yoke slash pockets allow for concealed mags. The Airmesh padded waistband takes the bite out of gunbelts, making it comfortable for all-day wear

DURABLE AND STYLISH - The high-quality fabrics used in VIKTOS Taculus jeans help retain the shape and fit of your favorite pair of jeans. 9.5oz Stretch Coolmax denim chassis will keep you comfortable all day long

VERSATILE FUNCTIONAL COMFORT - Straight legs and a relaxed fit give you a better range of movement making these jeans great for long days at the range or on the field. These jeans keep you comfortable throughout any task
